description.name: TCT Circular Saw Blade with Holes 230x22x60T
description.long_desc:
GEKO TCT high-quality Circular Saw Blade for wood cutting.


Product Features



  • Suitable for rip and cross-cutting in natural wood, plywood, laminates, particleboard and MDF

  • Tungsten carbide-tipped teeth

  • High-quality steel core

  • Laser cut expansion slots prevents overheating, warping and reduce vibration

  • Special core holes for blade cooling while working


Technical Data



  • Blade Diameter: 230 mm

  • Hole Size: 22 mm

  • Number of Teeth: 60

description.name: TCT Aluminium Circular Saw Blade 200x32x100T + 5 reductions 32/ -30 -25,4 -22,2 -20 -16
description.long_desc:
GEKO TCT high-quality Circular Saw Blade for Aluminium.


Product Features



  • Suitable for cutting non-ferrous metals, light alloys and aluminium extrusions

  • High-quality steel core

  • 100 tungsten carbide-tipped teeth

  • 32mm bore with 30mm, 25mm, 20mm and 16mm reduction rings included


Technical Data



  • Blade Diameter: 200 mm

  • Thickness: 2,5 mm

  • Hole Size: 32 mm

  • Number of Teeth: 100

  • Speed [rpm]: 8000

  • Suitable for cutting wood, plywood, profiled boards, panels

  • Precision sharpened teeth for fast & smooth cuts

  • High-quality steel core

  • Special core holes for blade cooling while working

  • Hole Size: 30 mm

  • Abrasive Material: Corundum

  • Abrasive Connection: Synthetic Resin

  • Blade Diameter: 230 mm

  • Thickness: 2,5 mm

  • Hole Size: 22,23 mm

  • Speed [rpm]: 6600

description.name: Segmented Rim Diamond Blade with Holes 125x22,2mm Rim 10mm GEKO Premium by laser
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Ideal for use on brick, block, concrete, aggregated concrete, masonry, stone and tile

  • Hardened steel body

  • Laser welded segments

  • Optimized hole pattern for fast dust removal and cooling


Technical Data



  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Hole Size: 22,23 mm

  • Height of Segments: 10 mm

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 12200
